duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify, evaluate, and pursue new strategic business opportunities.
Direct transaction activities and build effective relationships with internal stakeholders and potential partner companies.
Establish the business case for in-licensing and out-licensing opportunities.
Run partnership discussion processes, including due diligence, drafting and negotiating term sheets, and collaborating with legal team on negotiation.
Collaborate with internal teams to optimize partnership structures and drive partnerships forward.
Develop meaningful relationships with senior management at potential partner companies.
Coach and mentor other team members on aspects of the deal process.
Execute plans and projects on demanding timetables.
Influence others in a tactful manner with supporting information and logic.
Generate and champion new and creative high-value ideas.
Anticipate and mitigate risk with a proactive and strategic approach.
Imbue a sense of urgency around decision-making.
Maintain impeccable integrity, accountability, and a result-oriented attitude.

education_certification.credential: Advanced degree (PhD, MD, or MBA) with a significant aptitude for complex scientific discussions.
